name: graphql-codegen-typescript-document-nodes
description: GraphQL Code Generator plugin for generating TypeScript modules with embedded GraphQL document nodes
author: Piotr Roszatycki

scripts.compile: tsc -m esnext --outDir dist/esnext && tsc -m commonjs --outDir dist/commonjs
scripts.lint: tsc --pretty -p . && tsc --pretty -p tests && tslint -p . && tslint -p tests && prettier --ignore-path .gitignore --list-different '**/*.js' '**/*.json' '**/*.ts' '**/*.yml' && markdownlint "*.md"
scripts.postpublish: git tag v$npm_package_version -a -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
